Sniper saw the autoguns come on-line. Sniper quickly talked hopping 
Hell Beast would turn off the autoguns, "Hell Beast, I know stuff 
about the maximals you can only dream. I know al of their com 
frequiencys. I know all who to attack. I know more about the maximals 
then you know. How about, atleast hear me out."
